sources.title: Remember the Day (1941)
sources.description: Elderly schoolteacher Nora Trinell, waiting to meet presidential nominee Dewey Roberts, recalls him as her student back in 1916 and his relation to Dan Hopkins, the man she married and lost. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/remember-the-day-1941/

metadata.Plot: Elderly schoolteacher Nora Trinell, waiting to meet presidential nominee Dewey Roberts, recalls him as her student back in 1916 and his relation to Dan Hopkins, the man she married and lost.
metadata.Writer: Philip Dunning, Philo Higley, Tess Slesinger
metadata.Actors: Claudette Colbert, John Payne, Shepperd Strudwick
